techmeme.title: Apple says the iPhone 16 series will be available in Indonesia from April 11, after Jakarta lifted a sales ban following Apple's $300M+ investment plan (Stanley Widianto/Reuters)
Gemini 2.5 Pro hands-on: a very strong model with 1M input and 64K output tokens, a January 2025 knowledge cut-off, and very, very impressive coding skills (Simon Willison/Simon Willison's Weblog)
Sources: Fidelity Investments is in the advanced stages of testing its own stablecoin, managed by its digital assets arm, as Trump pledges to back stablecoins (Philip Stafford/Financial Times)
Microsoft unveils AI deep reasoning agents for 365 Copilot: Researcher, based on OpenAI's deep research model, and o3-mini-based Analyst, rolling out in April (Richard Lawler/The Verge)
Sources: the EU's Huawei corruption probe is looking at alleged gifts like soccer tickets exchanged for political favors; one detainee was a Huawei lobbyist (Laura Dubois/Financial Times)
